ComicInfo.Title: Proof; Performance No. 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
A wealthy man visits a brothel stocked with duplicates of famous Hollywood sex symbols! Also: the ever-popular faked orgasm in public works even better when she's rolling naked on the floor, and a red-hot cunt-eating session between lesbian assassins. Yum!
